text: The Red Badge of Courage is a novel by Stephen Crane. It was published in 1895 by D. Appleton & Co. It tells of a young man's combat experiences during the American Civil War. It received mostly good reviews. It was made into a movie in 1951 starring WWII hero, Audie Murphy. Category:American novels Category:1890s books Category:Novels about the American Civil War Category:Works by Stephen Crane
title: The Red Badge of Courage
